tear a severe gash across my [This.GetBodyPartInjured]

with a single blow, crush my [This.GetBodyPartInjured]

sever my head from my body
only one of us remain standing
one of us yields from injury
Forfeit your claim to my rule, and walk away from this fight!
I do not want your titles! Just give up your claims to *mine*!
takes my hand, saying "you already have it". Then [From.GetSheHe] helps me stand and squeezes my shoulder. "Perhaps we can work these differences out?", [From.GetSheHe] offers.
spits in my face, to the jarring snickers of the crowd. I am left kneeling, face red with shame, and a cold anger growing in the pit of my stomach.

thrust my [GetDuelWeapon] hard into [other_combatant.GetHerHis] chest. The surprise is clear on [other_combatant.GetHerHis] face, as blood fills [other_combatant.GetHerHis] mouth. I must have hit something important

sink my [GetDuelWeapon] into [other_combatant.GetHerHis] chest! The [other_combatant.GetManWoman] groans, and it takes a while before my own heart stops pounding. Then [other_combatant.GetSheHe] is still

throw my [GetDuelWeapon], into [other_combatant.GetHerHis] stomach. The [other_combatant.GetManWoman] falls, [other_combatant.GetHerHis] guts spilling out on the ground. [other_combatant.GetSheHeCap] does not rise again
pull the trigger, firing my last bullet. It finds [other_combatant.GetHerHis] temple

land a perfect blow to [other_combatant.GetHerHis] neck. The [other_combatant.GetManWoman] drops [other_combatant.GetHerHis] weapon and clutches desperately at [other_combatant.GetHerHis] throat, but the wound is already claiming [other_combatant.GetHerHis] life

thrusts [other_combatant.GetHerHis] [other_combatant.GetDuelWeapon] hard into my chest. I stop, my breath catching in my throat, followed by the taste of blood. [other_combatant.GetSheHeCap] must have... Hit something important

is sinking [other_combatant.GetHerHis] [other_combatant.GetDuelWeapon] into my chest. I groan, meeting the eyes of the [other_combatant.GetManWoman], who looks shocked at [other_combatant.GetHerHis] own success
throws [other_combatant.GetHerHis] [other_combatant.GetDuelWeapon] – it hits my stomach and I fall to the ground, trying to keep my own guts from spilling out. There is so much... Pain
pulls the trigger, firing what has to be [other_combatant.GetHerHis] last bullet. The noise rings in my ears as I fall to the ground
lunges at me. Then I feel the warmth of blood surrounding my neck. My.. My throat has been cut open
who was flailing miserably with [This.GetHerHis] [This.GetDuelWeapon]. I am told the poor [This.GetManWoman] soiled [This.GetHerselfHimself] as death came to claim [This.GetHerHim]
who was cut down with ease. The symbols of high rank on [This.GetHerHis] uniform apparently went unnoticed, until a soldier stumbled over [This.GetHerHis] corpse
who resisted bravely until [This.GetSheHe], according to reports, tripped on [This.GetHerHis] own [This.GetDuelWeapon]
who cut down several good men, before taking a mighty blow of an ax to [This.GetHerHis] head
who probably could have made it out of that fight, "had [This.GetSheHe] not been overwhelmed by [This.GetHerHis] enemies". The scout reddens. "I mean our troops, my [Root.GetLordLady]"
who probably could have made it out of the fight, had [This.GetSheHe] not been overwhelmed by [This.GetHerHis] enemies. The scout frowns. "I am sorry to bring you these news, my [Root.GetLordLady]"
who is rumored to have put up a tough fight, even when dozens of soldiers ganged up on [This.GetHerHim]
who was dominating the battlefield, right up until [This.GetSheHe] met [This.GetHerHis] unfortunate end
fought bravely, and held out longer than [This.GetHerHis] enemies anticipated
This option is available because you are a §Gbetter§! dueler than §Y[enemy_commander.GetTitledFirstName]§!

This option is available because you are a §Rworse§! dueler than §Y[enemy_commander.GetTitledFirstName]§!
This option is available because of your §Rlow§! §YPersonal Combat§! skill
taking complete control of the situation!
expertly outmaneuvering the enemy commander and painting the battlefield with [enemy_commander.GetHerHis] blood!
completely disrupting the flow of the battle and getting [This.GetHerselfHimself] injured in the process.
[combatant_2.GetFirstName]'s attacks were vicious and unrelenting, leaving [combatant_1.GetFirstName] severely injured...
In the duel [combatant_1.GetFirstName] suffered some minor injuries, but I am sure they will only serve to build character!
Fortunately, [combatant_1.GetFirstName] got away without any significant injuries.
[combatant_1.GetFirstName] thought [combatant_1.GetSheHe] was going to die, and blames me for it!

I am exhausted, I realize. In fact, breathing is hard, and my chest feels tight. "What is...", I mumble, as I fall to the ground, catching a glimpse of [other_combatant.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName] in the crowd. The [other_combatant.GetMySpymasterName] is grinning in triumph.
\nSuddenly, the taste of blood fills my mouth. "YOU were going to poison ME?", [other_combatant.GetSheHe] hisses, throwing a second dagger into my chest.

Could I have messed up the ingredients...? "Wait!" I call out in desperation, trying to buy myself some time. Something is wrong, I think frantically, but it is too late. The [other_combatant.GetManWoman] [other_combatant.GetKillingBlowOnMeShort].

My [This.GetMySpymasterName] tells me that you were seen coating your weapons, [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] says, disappointment tinging [other_combatant.GetHerHis] words. I protest, but my [other_combatant.GetRootRelation] has me seized by [other_combatant.GetHerHis] guards.

We have not even started, when my [other_combatant.GetRootRelation] waves a hand in dismissal. "I have eyes and ears everywhere, [Root.GetFirstName]. Poison, truly?", [other_combatant.GetSheHe] sighs. I can feel the eyes of the crowd on me, burning with contempt at the idea.

The poison should have worked by now, I think to myself, frantically dodging another attack. Am I caught? Did I bungle the ratio? Soon, my opponent has [other_combatant.GetHerHis] blade pointed at my throat.
Why are the trees so colorful suddenly...? I... Can't hold my [Root.GetDuelWeapon] up... Oh, the [Root.Capital.GetGroundDesc] looks so comfy...
Could [other_combatant.GetSheHe] have... If I didn't know better, I'd argue that I am experiencing ... symptoms of ... of poison.
Is this not reminiscent of how nightshade would make a person feel, if they had been poisoned? Wait, NOOOOO!
What have I eaten today...? My food taster was right there... Oh, by [This.Religion.GetHighGodName], this is not how I wanted to go.
it easily could have been worse
it is not going to leave any lasting means
it's going to hurt for a while
it's going to leave more than a scar
It easily could have been worse
It shouldn't leave any lasting means
It's going to hurt for a while
It's going to leave more than a scar
felt like an extension of my arm
looks fancy but I'm not so sure I know how to use it.
and the ground felt firm beneath me
the wind blew gently across my face
and meeting [other_combatant.GetFirstName]'s eyes I saw they were full of apprehension
and around us the onlookers held their breath
and struck once, I did not need to strike again
and brought my [GetDuelWeapon] down upon [other_combatant.GetHerHim]. They fended off the first blow but not the second
and in a whirlwind of blows they were down
Once the duel was over, I mopped the sweat off my brow
After the duel is done I wipe the blood off my [GetDuelWeapon]
Once it is done I roar in victory
I left them lying on the ground and went to celebrate my victory
before I know it I am lying on the ground in a puddle of my own blood
I am doubled over clutching a wound in my side.
I am on the ground holding back tears...
